parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.72

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Custom Panels

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Controls availability of component to given object info panel.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> unit [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]] [panelID, componentClassOrType]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> panelID: [[String]] - "left" or "right" can be used as panel names

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> componentClassOrType: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if component was successfully enabled on the panel, [[false]] otherwise (e.g. component is not available for the object)

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [unit, turretPath] [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]] [panelID, componentClassOrType]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] - the concerned vehicle


</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - turret index

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> panelID: [[String]] - "left" or "right" can be used as panel names

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> componentClassOrType: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns true if specific component "SensorDisplay" is enabled on player vehicle's left panel</value></part></template>
_state = [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] [[player]], [-1]] [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]] ["VehicleSystemsDisplayManagerComponentLeft", "SensorDisplay"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code><template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns true if all "SensorsDisplayComponent" components are enabled on player vehicle's left panel, otherwise returns false</value></part></template>
_state = [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[vehicle]] [[player]], [-1]] [[infoPanelComponentEnabled]] ["VehicleSystemsDisplayManagerComponentLeft", "SensorsDisplayComponent"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma 3 Custom Info]], [[infoPanel]], [[infoPanels]], [[setInfoPanel]], [[infoPanelComponents]], [[enableInfoPanelComponent]]
</value></part></template></root>
